mapper.select: SELECT gell_num, gell_cate, gell_name, gell_address, gell_main_img, gell_info, gell_manager, gell_grade, gell_status, gell_hit, gell_article_count, gell_rdate, gell_wdate, gell_sanctions_rdate, gell_sanctions_wdate, gell_sanctions_grade FROM gc_gell WHERE gell_rdate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND `gell_grade` = '0' ORDER BY gell_rdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;

SELECT gell_num, gell_cate, gell_name, gell_address, gell_main_img, gell_info, gell_manager, gell_grade, gell_status, gell_hit, gell_article_count, gell_rdate, gell_wdate, gell_sanctions_rdate, gell_sanctions_wdate, gell_sanctions_grade FROM gc_gell WHERE gell_rdate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND `gell_grade` = '1' ORDER BY gell_rdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;

SELECT gell_num, gell_cate, gell_name, gell_address, gell_main_img, gell_info, gell_manager, gell_grade, gell_status, gell_hit, gell_article_count, gell_rdate, gell_wdate, gell_sanctions_rdate, gell_sanctions_wdate, gell_sanctions_grade FROM gc_gell WHERE gell_rdate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND `gell_grade` = '2' ORDER BY gell_rdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;
SELECT gell_num, gell_cate, gell_name, gell_address, gell_grade FROM gc_gell WHERE gell_status = 0 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0, 10;
SELECT gell_num, gell_cate, gell_name, gell_address, gell_grade, gell_hit FROM gc_gell WHERE gell_rdate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) ORDER BY gell_hit DESC LIMIT 0, 10;

SELECT a.gell_name, a.gell_address, b.*, c.* FROM gc_gell AS a JOIN gc_gell_article AS b ON a.gell_num = b.articlel_gell_num JOIN gc_gell_file AS c ON b.article_num = c.file_article_num WHERE b.article_recommend_count >= 1 AND a.gell_grade = 0 ORDER BY b.article_rdate DESC;
select * from `gc_gell` WHERE `gell_today_rank`>='1' and `gell_grade`='0' ORDER BY `gell_today_rank` ASC;
SELECT * FROM `gc_gell` WHERE `gell_rdate` BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) AND CURDATE() and `gell_grade`='0' ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), gell_rdate)) LIMIT 5;
mapper.update: UPDATE `gc_gell` SET `gell_today_article_count` = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `gc_gell_article` WHERE DATE(`article_rdate`) = CURDATE() AND `gc_gell`.`gell_num` = `gc_gell_article`.`articlel_gell_num` );

UPDATE gc_gell AS gell INNER JOIN ( SELECT gell_num, @rank := @rank + 1 AS rank FROM gc_gell WHERE gell_today_article_count > 0 AND gell_grade = '0' ORDER BY gell_today_article_count DESC ) AS ranking ON gell.gell_num = ranking.gell_num SET gell.gell_today_rank = ranking.rank;

UPDATE `gc_gell` AS `gell` INNER JOIN ( SELECT `gc_gell`.`gell_num`, `subquery`.`cnt`, @rank := @rank + 1 AS `rank` FROM `gc_gell` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `articlel_gell_num`, COUNT(*) AS `cnt` FROM `gc_gell_article` WHERE DATE(`article_rdate`) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY `articlel_gell_num` ) AS `subquery` ON `gc_gell`.`gell_num` = `subquery`.`articlel_gell_num` WHERE `gc_gell`.`gell_num` IN ( SELECT `articlel_gell_num` FROM `gc_gell_article` WHERE DATE(`article_rdate`) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY `articlel_gell_num` ) AND `gc_gell`.`gell_grade` = '0' ORDER BY `subquery`.`cnt` DESC ) AS `ranking` ON `gell`.`gell_num` = `ranking`.`gell_num` SET `gell`.`gell_yesterday_rank` = `ranking`.`rank`;
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `gc_gell_article` AS d WHERE d.`article_rdate` >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), Interval -1 Day), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND d.`article_rdate` < STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T')) AS `article_count`, COUNT(*) AS `comment_count` FROM (SELECT a.`comment_rdate` FROM `gc_gell_comment` AS a UNION ALL SELECT b.`re_comment_rdate` FROM `gc_gell_re_comment` AS b) AS c WHERE c.`comment_rdate` >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), Interval -1 Day), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND c.`comment_rdate` < STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T');

SELECT * FROM `gc_gell_article` AS a LEFT JOIN `gc_gell_file` AS b ON a.`article_num` = b.`file_article_num` WHERE a.`articlel_gell_num` = 135 GROUP BY a.`article_num` ORDER BY a.`article_rdate` DESC LIMIT #{start}, 25;

SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS `rank`, e.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum2 := @rownum2 +1 AS `preRank`, f.* FROM ( SELECT d.gell_name, d.`gell_address`, d.`gell_rdate`, COUNT( case when a.`article_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when b.`comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when c.`re_comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) then 1 end ) AS `total`, COUNT( case when DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) > a.`article_rdate` AND a.`article_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 HOUR) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) > b.`comment_rdate` AND b.`comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 HOUR) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) > c.`re_comment_rdate` AND c.`re_comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 HOUR) then 1 end ) AS `preTotal` FROM `gc_gell` AS d LEFT JOIN `gc_gell_article` AS a ON a.`articlel_gell_num` = d.`gell_num` left JOIN `gc_gell_comment` AS b ON a.article_num = b.comment_article_num left JOIN `gc_gell_re_comment` AS c ON b.comment_num = c.re_comment_oir_num WHERE d.gell_grade = #{gall_type} AND d.`gell_status` = 0 GROUP BY d.`gell_num` ORDER BY `preTotal` DESC, d.`gell_rdate` ASC ) AS f, (SELECT @rownum2 := 0) AS s ) AS e, (SELECT @rownum := ${start}) AS r order BY `total` DESC, `preRank` ASC, `gell_rdate` ASC LIMIT #{start}, 10 ;

SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS `rank`, e.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum2 := @rownum2 +1 AS `preRank`, f.* FROM ( SELECT d.gell_name, d.`gell_address`, d.`gell_rdate`, COUNT( case when a.`article_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when b.`comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when c.`re_comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) then 1 end ) AS `total`, COUNT( case when DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) > a.`article_rdate` AND a.`article_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 DAY) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) > b.`comment_rdate` AND b.`comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 DAY) then 1 end ) + COUNT( case when DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) > c.`re_comment_rdate` AND c.`re_comment_rdate` >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 DAY) then 1 end ) AS `preTotal` FROM `gc_gell` AS d LEFT JOIN `gc_gell_article` AS a ON a.`articlel_gell_num` = d.`gell_num` left JOIN `gc_gell_comment` AS b ON a.article_num = b.comment_article_num left JOIN `gc_gell_re_comment` AS c ON b.comment_num = c.re_comment_oir_num WHERE d.gell_grade = #{gall_type} AND d.`gell_status` = 0 GROUP BY d.`gell_num` ORDER BY `preTotal` DESC, d.`gell_rdate` ASC ) AS f, (SELECT @rownum2 := 0) AS s ) AS e, (SELECT @rownum := ${start}) AS r order BY `total` DESC, `preRank` ASC, `gell_rdate` ASC LIMIT #{start}, 10 ;
select * from `gc_gell` where `gell_grade`='0' ORDER BY `gell_cate` asc;

SELECT * FROM `gc_gell_article` AS a LEFT JOIN `gc_gell_file` AS b ON a.`article_num` = b.`file_article_num` WHERE a.`articlel_gell_num` = 134 AND a.article_status = 0 GROUP BY a.`article_num` ORDER BY a.`article_rdate` DESC LIMIT 0, 12;

WITH random_galleries AS ( SELECT gell_num FROM gallery WHERE gell_cate = #{cate} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4 ) SELECT a.* FROM gell_articleVO a JOIN random_galleries rg ON a.articlel_gell_num = rg.gell_num WHERE a.article_recommend_count >= 10 ORDER BY a.article_wdate DESC LIMIT 5;
